issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: refactor LLAP plan cache avoidance and fix issue in merge processor

comments.body: [~prasanth_j] can you take a look? Note this also fixes the usage in Reduce and Merge processors where close() uses the "cache" field, but that field is never initialized - instead, ctors use a local variable.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12822362/HIVE-14433.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to build exiting with an error
